definitions.definition: Critical assessment of a process or activity or of their results.
examples: After you hand in your essays, I will give both grades and feedback .

definitions.definition: The part of an output signal that is looped back into the input to control or modify a system.
The high-pitched howling noise heard when there is a loop between a microphone and a speaker .

main_definition: Critical assessment of a process or activity or of their results.
secondary_definitions: ( electronics , cybernetics , control theory ) The part of an output signal that is looped back into the input to control or modify a system.
( amplification ) The high-pitched howling noise heard when there is a loop between a microphone and a speaker .
